_header: Man have it in thy thought / Of what matter thou maked is
Subjects: evils of the times; confession, value of
_description: ‘A good makyng of iour delaye’ — thirteen 8-line stanzas

BodDig102.First Lines:
Man haue hit in þy þouȝtOf what mater þou maked
                    is…
BodDig102.Last Lines:
…Be euene wiþ world er ȝe gon henneFor þere
                    schal be no iour delay
BodDig102.Attributed Title: A good makynge of iour delaye (f. 105v)
BodDig102.Editions:
Kail,  J.,
                        ed.  
             Twenty-Six Political and Other Poems…from Bodleian MSS Digby 102
                and Douce 322.
EETS
         o.s. 124 (1904; repr. 1973): 31-4.
